I remember that I rented this in mid-eighties in Sweden and it scared the shit out of me..Not quite so scare not.

Juliet Mills plays the cheating wife of San Francisco record producer Robert Barrett
(Gabriele Lavia) and gets pregnant after a fling with Dimitri (Richard Johnson). What Mills doesn&#039;t know is that Dimitri is a Satanist, and she is bearing the Antichrist. 

Encoded with DVD-Shrink. Untouched.
Ripped from the German X-Rated release (book cover). Includes a (pretty crappy) custom cover.
